p: Methods: Blood was obtained from healthy volunteers who signed an informed consent form approved by the local research ethics committee. TCP [(16 ± 4) x 10 6 mL -1] was created by mixing platelet-poor plasma with packed cells. The samples were diluted or not to 60 % with TRIS/saline buffer and subjected to clotting in the presence of tPA. Blood was spiked with fibrinogen (3.0 mg/mL) and/or FEIBA (1 U/mL). Maximum clot firmness (MCF, mm) and lysis onset time (LOT, min) were evaluated using rotational thromboelastometry and presented as Mean ± SD.
